channel.title: International Expansion on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in International Expansion on FinanClub

item.title: VFS
item.description: score:25 Chances: VinFast Auto gained significant attention and experienced a massive rally in August, indicating investor interest in the company’s potential. The Vietnamese EV maker, VinFast, has made its U.S. debut, signaling its expansion into international markets, which could offer growth opportunities. VinFast’s successful business combination with Black Spade Acquisition Co.

item.title: ABEV
item.description: score:48 Chances: Ambev S.A. continues to see growth potential, with its net profit rising 36% in Q4, and its efforts to tap into the international beverage market. The demand for energy drinks could boost Ambev’s sales, as it navigates through inflationary pressures and explores growth opportunities.
